definition.text: The position of the plugin file position node determines the position in the workspace on which the plugin hierarchy is placed.

translations.text: La posición del plugin El nodo de posicin del archivo determina la posicin en el workspace en el que se coloca la jerarquía de plugin.

paragraphs.text: To define where the hierarchy defined in a plugin file is positioned in the workspace, move the plugin file position node to the desired position in the workspace, and pin the node. Then, collapse the plugin file node so that the plugin file position node is no longer visible.
